Velocity Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2014-10-02  | Version: 0.3.1
Velocity Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

velocity:velocity

Full name:

net.rumati.maven.plugins:velocity-maven-plugin:0.3.1:velocity

Description:

Processes a Velocity template

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: runtime.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
encoding String - The character set encoding to be used when reading and writing files. If this is not set, then project.build.sourceEncoding is used. If project.build.sourceEncoding is also not set, then the default character set encoding is used.
User property is: velocity-maven-plugin.encoding.
outputFile File - Output file
User property is: velocity-maven-plugin.outputFile.
template String - The template. This can be either a path to a file or a path to a resource somewhere in the classpath.
User property is: velocity-maven-plugin.template.
transformations Transformation[] - A list of transformations. Each entry contains a template and outputFile to be processed.

Parameter Details

encoding:

The character set encoding to be used when reading and writing files. If this is not set, then project.build.sourceEncoding is used. If project.build.sourceEncoding is also not set, then the default character set encoding is used.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: velocity-maven-plugin.encoding

outputFile:

Output file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: velocity-maven-plugin.outputFile

template:

The template. This can be either a path to a file or a path to a resource somewhere in the classpath.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: velocity-maven-plugin.template

transformations:

A list of transformations. Each entry contains a template and outputFile to be processed.
  • Type: net.rumati.maven.plugins.velocity.Transformation[]
  • Required: No
